page.title: 16FARMING 3
page.content: A typical local farm consisting of 320 acres,has 210 acres of arable and 110 acres of pasture.The arable average is made up of wheat,barley,maize and grass for seed.Cereal yields should produce about 3 tons to the acre.Crop rotation is carried out.Liquid fertilizer is used on the arable land and granulated fertilizer is spread on grass land.There are 5000 poultry in battery cages and on deep litter.Machinery on the farm consists of 5 tractors,1 forklift,and a combine harvester plus variable arable implements.The farmer employs 4 full time people and 4 part time employers.He also uses the services of a local contractor. By Simon Kennedy.
